summary: Star Alliance is the world's biggest and first global airline group, based in Germany. It was formed in 1997 and has 25 airlines as members. Together, they operate over 5,000 planes, flying to almost 1,300 airports in 195 countries. This alliance offers a rewards program with benefits like priority boarding. Member airlines often share airport terminals and use the Star Alliance logo on their planes. With a market share of 17.4%, it's larger than its competitors, SkyTeam and Oneworld.
title: Star Alliance
